resources.string: Start by picking a picture to be scanned.
Detection accuracy is affected by various factors. Visit doctors if you have unusual symptoms.

We regret to inform you that the results of your cancer detection test indicate a likelihood of cancer. We understand that this news may be distressing, but please know that early detection and treatment can significantly improve outcomes. We\'re here to support you every step of the way and provide guidance on your next steps. Please don\'t hesitate to reach out to your healthcare provider for further evaluation and personalized care.

We are pleased to inform you that the results of your cancer detection test indicate a likelihood of cancer. We understand that this news may be a relief, but please know that regular screenings and healthy lifestyle choices can help reduce your risk of developing cancer. We encourage you to continue to prioritize your health and well-being by maintaining a balanced diet, staying active, and avoiding harmful habits. If you have any concerns or questions, please don\'t hesitate to reach out to your healthcare provider for further guidance.

Asclepius is dedicated to providing you with a seamless experience in monitoring your skin health. Our app harnesses advanced technology to offer you a simple yet effective way to stay vigilant against skin cancer. With Asclepius, detecting potential issues early is convenient and accessible.
